nodes.text: After the bombing of Coruscant's central power distribution grid and breakdown of peace talks, the Galactic Republic launched an attack on the Separatists, killing many—including prominent Separatist Senator Mina Bonteri—in the process. While Republic spies instead attributed Bonteri's death to Separatist agents, their leader Count Dooku withdrew Bonteri's peace proposal offered by the Separatist Senate.
